ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] (OT) Squad Ring Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s actually one reason I was doing it - I was getting experience the whole time, so it was double-value. Even the warbeads were good exp at 9th.  At
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:05 AM 5/30/2001 -0400, you wrote:

>So basically it's really not worth all the time and effort, unless you're
>getting good exp from all the goblins. Seems like for something THAT hard
>it'd be a better ring.

That's actually one reason I was doing it - I was getting experience the
whole time, so it was double-value. Even the warbeads were good exp at
9th. At 11th, I'm experiencing the land of diminishing returns, so I will
probably move on soon.


>Is it just me or do most of the quests here kinda stink? You'd think
>they'd make the exp gained a bit more..I mean, they're quests after
>all..not just running outside and beating somethings head in.

Well, in this case, the quest specifically ASKS you to go outside and beat
something's head in. The necklaces are just to prove that you did.

Talies the Wanderer
